content:
Field Marketing Operations Coordinator - Admin (Phuket Based)Wyndham Vacation Resorts (Thailand) LimitedJob Highlights
Administrator, Coordinator, Tour Booking, Teamwork
Processing, Marketing, Stock order, Email, Service
Information, Communication,Data integrity,FlexiblePRINCIPAL RESPONSIBILITIES:  (Include but not limited to)

Process tour bookings in Club Wyndham Asia’s system
Assist with reporting for the Field Marketing department
Assist with the Dispatch/Logistics function of Field Marketing
Assist with the processing and approval of Field Marketing  payroll
Assist with processing of invoices
Assist with organizing and sourcing Field Marketing collateral and premiums
Gain relevant approvals for and complete stock orders for all Field Marketing regions
Provide Adhoc information requests
Ensure data integrity of systems and maintain accurate records to ensure departmental compliance with business and government standards and regulations.
Display Count on Me! Service to all internal and external parties
Show integrity in all aspects of the position by doing the right thing, taking responsibility and delivering on the Wyndham promise.
Display leadership values by ensuring effective communication and respecting your peers and managers. Support others within the team and empower each other wherever possible.
Adhere to all company policies and procedures
Any other duties within your skill levels as requested by the Company from time to time

 KEY POSITION CRITERIA:

Committed to providing excellent customer service at all times.
Be detailed, accurate and thorough.
Possess a positive, can do attitude with the ability to self motivate.
Intermediate to advanced MS Office skills, particularly Microsoft Excel and Access
Ability to work in a fast paced environment
Good written and verbal communication skills with the ability to effectively respond to questions from managers, co-workers and clients.
Ability to meet time frames and performance standards
Ability to manage multiple tasks and be able to think laterally when problem solving
Good time management skills
Flexibility in working schedule- ability to work weekends, public holidays and evenings as requiredundefined

Oversea Purchasing / Import - Export/เจ้าหน้าที่ต่างประเทศXenon Inter Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
มีความก้าวหน้าในการทำงาน
โอกาสในการเติบโตสูง
มีการทำงานที่หลากหลายหน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ

จัดหา และสั่งซื้อสินค้า จาก supplier ต่างประเทศ 
ติดตามการดำเนินการนำเข้า ระยะเวลาการผลิต และเงื่อนไขการขนส่งจนสินค้าถึงโกดัง
ตรวจสอบเอกสารการนำเข้า/ส่งออก สินค้า ได้แก่ Invoice, Packing list, AWB, B/L และขอใบอนุญาตนำเข้าต่างๆ
ดูแลเอกสารการชำระสินค้า ผ่านธนาคาร (นำเข้า / ส่งออก) ในเงื่อนไข L/C, B/C, T/T
ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง ในการส่งกลับคืน / เคลมหากสินค้าไม่ได้มาตรฐาน
ติดต่อ และยื่นเอกสารกับหน่วยงานราชการ เพื่อนำเข้า และส่งออกสินค้า

คุณสมบัติ

ระดับการศึกษา : ปริญญาตรี ขึ้นไป
ประสบการณ์(ปี) : 1ปีขึ้นไป

คุณสมบัติเพิ่มเติม

ประสบการณ์ ในตำแหน่ง Import / Export 1 ปีขึ้นไป
มีความรู้ด้านภาษาอังกฤษ
มีบุคลิกภาพดี คล่องแคล่ว ว่องไว ไหวพริบดี พูดจาฉะฉาน มีความมั่นใจ กระตือรือร้น
มีความรับผิดชอบสูง และมีความอดทนundefined

IT System AdministratorIsuzu Motors Co., (Thailand) Ltd.Job Highlights
IT support
IT Administrator
System supportProfile & Qualifications Required

20 - 25 Years Old
Experience  0-3 Years.
Bachelor degree in Information Technology, Computer Engineer or related fields.
Able to report and communicate in English.
Able to work overtime and holiday
Specific Knowledge:

Have basic knowledge of Operating System Windows (+ AD or LINUX is advantage)
Have some knowledge in basic application program skill such as Microsoft excel,
Have good service mind
Key Responsibility:

Support for IT admin (user password and permission management)
Update status and report by periodical (Weekly , Monthly , Yearly)
Server Replacement/Improvement in part of admin and AD (Active Directory)
Receive problems from 1st tier, work around in admin concern point  and troubleshooting
Monitoring, Checking and investigate system healthy and performance
Maintain Email & VPN account (Add / Remove / Change)
Or other assignment that relate the job improvementundefined

เจ้าหน้าที่สนับสนุนการตลาดBoonrawd Brewery Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
เจ้าหน้าที่ธุรการ
มีความรู้เรื่องการจัดเทรดโปรโมชั่นส่งเสริมการขาย
ประสานงานResponsibilities:

ช่วยจัดทำงบประมาณของแผนงานและเสนอความคิดในการวางแผนต่างๆของหน่วยงาน
ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานภายในบริษัท
ดำเนินการจัดทำงบประมาณของหน่วยงาน รวมทั้งตั้งหนี้ ติดตามการใช้งบประมาณ และค่าใช้จ่ายต่างๆของหน่วยงานกับ Supplier และคู่ค้าตามแผนงานที่กำหนดไว้
ติดต่อประสานงานหน่วยงานต่างๆ ทั้งภายในและภายนอก ดูแลควบคุมงานเอกสารต่างๆตามระเบียบ นโยบายของบริษัทตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย
Qualifications:

จบการศึกษาระดับชั้นปริญญาตรี
สามารถใช้ Ms. Office ได้ดี เช่น Ms.Excel, Ms.Word
มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานธุรการมาก่อน โดยเฉพาะในกลุ่มผลิตภัณฑ์อุปโภคบริโภคจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษundefined

Maintenance EngineerSiam Denso Manufacturing Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Maintenance Engineer
Corrective and Preventive Maintenance
Automotive PartsResponsibilities
• Monitor and maintain machine
• Cooperate all issues for Reactive maintenance
• Responsible for the maintenance and repair of machines and equipment including Preventive Maintenance
• Analyze the problem, the cause of the problem in the process, machine production line problems
• Make recommendations to repair the damaged parts effectively• Join the training and cross-functional meetings in respect of the responsibility
• Plan TPM and PM Machine and Spare Part
• Management and control BM plan and KPI.
• Other assigned jobs from the supervisor

 Requirements

• Good English Communicate (Must have TOEIC score 400 up)
• Experience of more than 0-2 years in a Maintenance, Corrective and Preventive Maintenance.
• Bachelor 's degree major in Mechanical Engineering, Control Engineering, Robot Automation Engineering, Mechatronic Engineering, Electrical Engineer.
• Knowledge in PLC, Robot, Sensor, Servo motor, CNC machine, Instrument, SCADA.undefined

Production Engineer (Supplier Development Engineer)Siam Denso Manufacturing Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Production Engineer
Supplier Development Engineer
Automotive partsResponsibilities
The SDE will help and support to develop a partnership with suppliers and give training and support to Lead productivity cost reduction activity (DENSO way) with suppliers.
- Early involvement in new projects, layout and set proper evaluation in place and hold vendors accountable on assuring their ability to meet company requirements, goals, and objectives.
- Help and support improving supplier process and procedures.
- Support divisions on suppliers to productivity improvement activities
- Ability to identify supplier improvements (process, cost reduction system) and ensure effective actions are taken to improve.
- Support / Lead productivity improvement Kaizen activities and cost reduction activities (DENSO way) with suppliers and develop supplier improvement plans.
- Develop and manage and report supplier performance KPI’s.
- Assumes and performs other duties as assigned.

Requirements
- Bachelor’s degree in engineering.
- At 1-4 years of experience in improvement and development quality supplier and development performance of supplier
- Must have TOEIC score 400
- Have a well coordination and interpersonal skills for both internal and external departments.
- Computer literacy including Microsoft Office.
- Superb communication, interpersonal and leadership skills, Problem solver with a strong analytical mindset.undefined

Customer Service Executive - Key AccountDHL eCommerce Solutions (Thailand) LimitedJob Highlights
Have experience in managing Key Account Client
Service mind and good interpersonal skills
Able to work under pressure and logical thinkingJob descriptions

Take care of Key Account Customer to provide smooth and engaging experience
Act as the primary contact for customers and liaise with vendors on the service delivery to customers
Prepare written correspondence to customers when required to furnish information requested by customers or in dealing with complaint resolution.
Proactively inform customers on shipment delays and potential service failures.
Anticipate customer needs and solve them properly.
Collaborate to set goals together with customer.
Provide responsive reply & ensure promptness in handling customers’ enquiries and complaints
Lead and drive customer satisfaction by providing best in class standards with a view towards establishing and maintaining a competitive advantage
Complete weekly, monthly and quarterly reports as required by customers and/or Management
Liaise with Operations Team and other internal functions to achieve prompt and efficient resolution of customer issues and queries.
Qualifications

Graduate with minimum Bachelor Degree
Minimum 1 years of experience in managing Key Account Client in express logistics, freight forwarding or other related
Service mind and good interpersonal skills
Able to work under pressure and logical thinking
Proficient in MS Office (Word, Excel)
Good command in Englishundefined

Sales Executive (Copper scrap) - SCG InternationalThe Siam Cement Public Company Limited (SCG)Job Highlights
Purchasing & Selling Non-ferrous scrap metals.
Partnerships with International& Domestic Customer
Able to work upcountryResponsibilities :


Responsible for the purchasing and selling of non-ferrous scrap metals. (Copper scrap)
Develop and grow partnerships with international and domestic customers (Local-Export-Offshore-Import)  
Establish and maintain current suppliers and potential supplier relationships.
Identify prospective customers and contact them and also other accounts as assigned.
Develop knowledge and market trends of Copper scraps market
Closely follow up supply situation
Manage account service through quality checks and others follow–up.
Assist in developing strategic plans for generating new sources and sales 
Prepare for Sales related documents 
Identify and resolve customer concerns.
Coordinate company staff and manage internal systems  to accomplish the work required to close sales.
Follow-up for collection of payment.
Coordinate shipping schedules , delivery , services.
Qualifications :
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration or related field
Good communication in both spoken and written English (required TOEIC at least 550)
Achieved a minimum GPA of 2.7 for Undergraduate and 3.3 for Post-graduate studies.
1 - 5 years of experience in Sales Executive (Industrial products) , Sales Import-Export  , Supply Chain 
Direct experience of Recycled / Metal -Non metal Non-Ferrous products or scraps related industry is preferable 
Having driving license
Able to work upcountry and rotate between each region is a must

Project CoordinatorITE-ACME Joint Venture Co.,LtdJob Highlights
Great interpersonal skills & fluent in English
Project Coordinator
EngineeringEmployment Type:   Permanent staff
Work days:                Monday – Friday (08.00 am – 05.00 pm)
Workplace:                Italthai Tower, Huaykwang, BKK
--------------------------------------------
Role Objectives:   

Responsibilities (in details):

Project support and task tracking including contracts, proposal letters, work authorizations, creation and/or maintenance of project directories and ensure all applicable permits are in place
Support Construction activities to ensure efficient process workflow
Monitor and report field progress including manpower and quantities installed against the resources loaded estimate
Support Construction documentation management to ensure configuration control 
Coordinate and set-up meetings with team members and stakeholders Document, distribute and follow-up on action items
Provide support to the Start-up and Commissioning team, including providing available manufacturer documentations and coordinating with 3rd Party vendor testing
Coordinate training of installed equipment with facilities and maintenance teams
Project Close-Out tasks include coordination of final inspections with local officials, close-out of all permits, documenting lessons learned and transmitting actual cost and schedule data to the estimating team for use in future project development

Qualifications:
-      Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or other related majors
-      At least 1 years of field oversight or coordinator experience with a construction firm.
-      Ability to effectively prioritize with strong time management skills in a fast-paced environment
-      Superior verbal and written communication skills
-      Proficiency in speaking English is a must
-      Highly organized with a strong attention to detail and professionalism and strong sense of urgency

Successful candidates will be remunerated:-
-     Life and Accident Insurance
-     Dental Claims
-     Health Insurance
-     Provident Fund
-     Bonus &  Salary Increment
-     Annual Leave 
-     Corporate Activities such as New Year party, Outing etc.


If you meet the qualifications and are excited about this opportunity, please submit your resume and cover letter for consideration. We look forward to hearing from you!
Contact person :   Jarukit  080-908-2504
Linkedin : ITE-ACME Joint Venture Co.,Ltd
www.ite-acme.com/
https://www.linkedin.com/company/ite-acme-jointventure-co-ltd/mycompany/undefined

Supply Chain Planner ( SCG Distribution )The Siam Cement Public Company Limited (SCG)Job Highlights
Planning & Design Supply Chain Model
Analyze & Control Supply Chain Costing Process
Exp. in Logistic Management, Supply Chain etc.หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ:
วางแผน และออกแบบ Supply Chain Operation Model และ Supply Chain Distribution Network ให้สอดคล้องประเภทสินค้าและระดับการบริการ (SLA)
วิเคราะห์ ติดตาม และวางแผนต้นทุนใน Supply Chain  เช่น ต้นทุนการบริหารจัดการคลังสินค้า ต้นทุนการจัดเก็บสินค้า ต้นทุนการจัดส่งและกระจายสินค้าให้เหมาะสมและสอดคล้องกับระดับการบริการ  
วางแผน และเสนอแนวทางสำหรับพัฒนากระบวณการใน Supply Chain (Supply Chain Process Improvement) เพื่อตอบสนองความต้องการของลูกค้า ในแต่ละช่องทางการขาย 
วิเคราะห์ และนำเสนอแนวทางในการลดต้นทุนใน Supply Chain 
ตรวจสอบและติดตาม Supply Chain Performance พร้อมเสนอแนวทางในการพัฒนาและปรับปรุงประสิทธิภาพ 
ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องทั้ง Internal และ External เพื่อให้การบริหารจัดการ Supply Chain  เป็นไปอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ


คุณสมบัติ : 


จบปริญญาตรีในสาขา Business Administration, Logistic, Supply Chain, Industrial Engineering หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง (GPA 2.70 ขึ้นไปในระดับปริญญาตรี และ GPA 3.30 ขึ้นไปในระดับปริญญาโท) 

มีทักษะภาษาอังกฤษในระดับดี (TOEIC > 550)
มีประสบการณ์ 1-3 ปี ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ Logistic, Supply Chain หรืออื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง (ยินดีรับพิจารณานักศึกษาจบใหม่)
มีทักษะในการใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office  และ Power BI ได้เป็นอย่างดี 
มีความอดทน ละเอียด รอบคอบ มีทักษะด้านการบริหารจัดการที่ดี สามารถทำงานเป็นทีม และ ทำงานภายใต้ภาวะกดดันได้
มีทักษะติดต่อประสานงาน  และมีไหวพริบในการแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้

Design EngineerSatys Electric (Thailand) Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Design Product & Drawing
Bachelor's Degree
SamutparkranDesign Engineer

Responsibilities:

Mainly responsibility is Design & Design support
Skilled in Drawing (2D, 3D)
Design product & drawing following specification of customer for production.
Check production control plan & Ensure Technical spec availability
Pre-define Process flow for production & ensure feasibility of product
Define production technical file and raw materials needed for Production
File document control for raw material & product.
Make & Control Bill Of Material (BOM). 
Make & Follow sample product for customer approval.
Make Document for Customer approval Record

Requirement:

Bachelor's Degree of Electrical Engineering /Electronic Engineering. 
2-5 years up for experience in Engineering Design (Electronic / Mechanical Fields).
Expert in AutoCAD (2D/3D)
Skilled on Pack Office

สวัสดิการ:


โบนัส
ประกันอุบัติเหตุกลุ่ม
เงินช่วยเหลือต่างๆ(ฌาปนกิจ,งานแต่งงาน,ค่าศึกษาบุตร)
ประกันสังคม
สิทธิวันลาพักร้อนสูงสุด 20 วันต่อปี ฯลฯ
ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี 

สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน  :  Bangkok Free Trade Zone (บางเสาธง  สมุทรปราการ)

เวลาปฏิบัติงาน  :  จ-ศ เวลา 07.30 -16.30 น. หรือ  08.30 – 17.30 น.

Satys Electric (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
No. 55/20,77 Moo15, Tambon Bangsaothong,
Amphur Bangsaothong, Samutprakarn 10570
Tel : (66)2182 5198-9 ext.108
Fax : (66) 2182 5200

QA Engineer (INSPECTION)Mitsubishi Electric Consumer Products (Thailand) Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
New graduated are welcome
Degree in Electronics Engineering
Experiences 0 – 4 yearsJob Scope:


PCB Development test for New Model
Dis-continue part and VE part evaluation.
Defected part investigation from production and customer claim.
Investigate defected part from Production and Testing room.
Reliability test (Electronic, Electric parts)
Responsibility for all claim part (Local & Oversea)
Incoming part Quality Control & Analysis job for construction part

Qualification


New graduated are welcome.
Bachelor's degree in Electronics Engineering
Experiences 0 – 4 years
Basic to English language for spoken and written.
Skill Expertise in Microsoft office (Proficient: PowerPoint & Excel)
Can use tools such as Digital oscilloscope, Scope Corders, power quality analysis.
TOEIC score minimum 400 point.

 Product: Air conditioner “Mitsubishi Electric Mr. Slim”

Working Location:

Amata City Chonburi Industrial Estate, Phase 4

700/406 Moo7 Tambol Don Hua Roh Amphur Muang Chonburi 20000

Working conditions:

Variable bonus
Provident fund
Saving cooperative
Medical allowance and life insurance (including family)

The successful candidate will receive generous remuneration package and fringe benefits. Interested persons please apply in person of send application letter with resume, Transcript and a recent photo to:

Mitsubishi Electric Consumer Products (Thailand) Co., Ltd.

Amata City Chonburi

700 / 406 Moo 7  Tambon Don Hua Roh Amphur Muang Chonburi 2000

Export Sales (Food Product : Located Singapore)Betagro Public Company LimitedJob Highlights
Export Sales / International Sales
Food Industry / FMCG / Trade
Work at Singapore Office (Relocation Provide)Job Purpose
Being the company representative as a front line contact to response to customer inquiry or needs and look for new business opportunities and expanding new customers in Singapore. Cooperate with HQ teams and departments to coordinate and drive sales to achieve the optimum profits to the company. 

1. Company representative and front line or initial contact with customers in Singapore
• Provide the best services as well as quick responsive to existing customers as well as coordinate with team in HQ and factory in Thailand on customers requirements
• Seeking and establishing a new customer, then pass the new customer to HQ sales and/or market team to follow up 

2. Information Gathering, generating report and look for new business opportunity
• Conduct market survey, analyze and report back to HQ regularly
• Generate reporting of the current state of sales performance and search for new business opportunities
• Work with marketing, product development and production team to develop product and sales plan to meet customer requirement
• Seeking for any new business opportunity in Singapore & Malaysia  in order to generate own income

Qualifications
1. Bachelor's/Master's Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Economics, or any related filed
2. Experiences at least 5 years in Sales & Marketing (Export Marketing would be advantage)
3. Having Business Knowledge in Marketing, Supply Chain, and Finance
4. Great communication (English TOEIC 650+ / Chinese HSK 3,4)
5. Able to use basic computer (MsOffice - Excel ,Power Point)
6. Well inter-personal skills and organized
7. Leadership skill, Achievement Oriented, Work under pressure 

undefined

Process EngineerMondi Bangkok Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
3 years experience in Process and Manufacturing
Analytic and problem solving aptitude
Good in Written & Spoken at EnglishLocation:  Petchaburi

Job Scope 


Assist in production operations to drive improvement in manufacturing efficiencies by utilizing continuous improvement techniques
Work with Quality and test to deliver a robust and cost-effective end to end process
Identify and implement new technologies, specification of requirements
Apply Lean Manufacturing and Sig Sigma tools and methodology / throughout the manufacturing facility and processes
Uses general data analysis skills to identify issues and use existing data sets that move projects and forward across multiple sites
Assist Process Owners in identifying barriers to project success and helps to drive changes when needed.
Problem solving in process an corrective action and Preventive action 
Co-ordinate with all other departments mainly production, quality and maintenance to ensure maximum utilization of machines and keep track of all key indicators.

Qualification

Bachelor Degree in Industrial Engineering or related
3 years experience in Process and Manufacturing
Working in an international surrounding is a plus
Understand BRC PPM for Food Packaging
Possesses basic statistical knowledge and the ability to apply statistics to process improvement projects
Excellent in Office Application software, Words, PowerPoint and Excel
Excellent inter-personal skills to build relationship internally and externally
Cross-functional business team environment experience preferred
Reliable and flexible in their approach
Good in Written & Spoken at English 
We invite qualified candidates to submit their resume stating
present and expected salary via: 

"Apply Now" 

Mondi TSP Co., Ltd.   
110 Moo 3, Nong Chumphon Nuea , Khao Yoi , Pechaburi ,Thailand 76140
https://www.mondigroup.comundefined

School Administrator/เจ้าหน้าที่ธุรการAster International School BangkokJob Highlights
Bachelor’s degree
Great attention to detail.
Flexible and adaptable approach.JOB HIGHLIGHTS

Bachelor’s degree
Experience of Human Resources work and other Administrative functions within a thriving and fast paced work environment.
Fluency in English and Thai language is essential.
Strong IT proficiency.
Great attention to detail.
Flexible and adaptable approach.
Able to work with colleagues and external agencies, with clear communication, a friendly disposition and a professional demeanor.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Administrative Support & Receptions
In discussion with the School Manager, Director of Business Services and Principal, coordinate and support on areas of Administration that the school requires. This could range to working alongside the academic team in running events.
Reporting to management and performing administrative duties.
Answering telephone calls, as well as screening and forwarding calls.
Welcoming and assisting visitors in a friendly and professional manner.
Handling basic inquiries and sorting mail.
Performing other administrative tasks, if required.

Please send resume Apply Nowundefined
